channel.title: Harry Truman's Policies
channel.description:
I have to right about "my" opinion, but hopefully I could get a little help from you guys. * This has to be like I am a Newspaper writer from a different country than the U.S., and I have to explain if Harry Trumans Policies were/were not strict enough...
Here is the layout: ------------------ My Role - Foreign Policy Analyzer Audience - American Newspaper Readers Format - Newspaper Editorial Topic - Were Harry Truman's policies to contain the spread of communism too soft?
Any help is appreciated... [b]NOTE:[/b] This is during the Cold War. Thanks, Mod Adam

item.title: Harry Truman's Policies
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

I have to right about “my” opinion, but hopefully I could get a little help from you guys.

  • This has to be like I am a Newspaper writer from a different country than the U.S., and I have to explain if Harry Trumans Policies were/were not strict enough…

Here is the layout:

My Role - Foreign Policy Analyzer
Audience - American Newspaper Readers
Format - Newspaper Editorial
Topic - Were Harry Truman’s policies to contain the spread of communism too soft?

Any help is appreciated…
